item.text: Brothers and sisters, if a person is discovered in some sin, you who are spiritual restore such a person in a spirit of gentleness. Pay close attention to yourselves, so that you are not tempted too.

<st data-num="941" class="">Carry</st> <st data-num="240">one anotherâ€™s</st> <st data-num="922" class="">burdens</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3779">in this way</st> you will <st data-num="378" class="">fulfill</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">thinks</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> when he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">nothing</st>, he <st data-num="5422" class="">deceives</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>.

Let <st data-num="1538">each one</st> <st data-num="1381" class="">examine</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">his own</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>. <st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he can <st data-num="2192" class="">take</st> <st data-num="2745" class="">pride</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> compare himself <st data-num="1519" class="">with</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2087">someone else</st>.
For each one will carry his own load.
Now the one who receives instruction in the word must share all good things with the one who teaches it.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="4105" class="">deceived</st>. <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="3456" class="">made a fool</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st>,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the person who <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st> <st data-num="5356" class="">corruption</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the one who <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> will <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> we must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1573">grow weary</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> in <st data-num="2540">due time</st> we will <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st>, if we do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1590">give up</st>.<n id="2" />
So then, whenever we have an opportunity, let us do good to all people, and especially to those who belong to the family of faith.
See what big letters I make as I write to you with my own hand!
Those who want to make a good showing in external matters are trying to force you to be circumcised. They do so only to avoid being persecuted for the cross of Christ.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> those who are <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcised</st> do <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5442" class="">obey</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> they <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to be <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcised</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they can <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5212" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> may <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">never</st> <st data-num="2744">boast</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> has been <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2504">and I</st> to the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="203" class="">uncircumcision</st> <st data-num="1510">counts for</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5100">anything</st>; the only thing that matters is a <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="2937" class="">creation</st>!<n id="3" />
And all who will behave in accordance with this rule, peace and mercy be on them, and on the Israel of God.
From now on let no one cause me trouble, for I bear the marks of Jesus on my body.
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brothers and sisters. Amen.
